column4: does ubuntu need anything for tightvnc to login it, besides remote desktop enebaled?
never used tightvnc im sure its fine but consider installing freenx

i am on windows, i am trying to control my othercomputer remotely with tightvnc.. but is there anythign i need to install first on ubuntu for it to work.. i got it working right now, but it closes after just a few mins
try a few diff vnc clients it seems like you might have everything setup right
